item.description:
For those who have seen the movie "The Matrix" know that Neo chose the red pill and opened to the reality of a world where anything is possible as long as you believe it to be true.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=te6qG4yn-Ps

Last week we all chose the Red pill and opened our reality to the Divine Matrix. We began by understanding how quantum physics is shaping a higher level of understanding “Reality.”

Simply stated, “Every person creates his or her own reality and experiences it subjectively.” We explored the connection between us and our Universe, how the Matrix works, and that we communicate through our emotions.

This week we will:

  • Explore the Art of Consciously Creating
  • Feeling is the language that Speaks to the Matrix
  • Begin to Understand the Holographic world we live in

Join us for an evening of learning more about what make the Law of Attraction work.

Facts will be taken from Gregg Braden’s book The Divine Matrix: Bridging Time, Space, Miracles, and Belief.


We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: The Power of Living in a Holographic World
